name: Person Avoider
author: ITR
description:
Ever accidentally joined a world containing somebody you're trying to avoid? Now you can get notified immediately when you join! Also notifies if they join a world you're in, and works no matter if you're blocked or they change name!
Heavily uses the source of [Knah's JoinNotifier](https://github.com/knah/VRCMods/tree/master/JoinNotifier).
For more info read the [README](https://github.com/ITR13/VrcPersonAvoiderMod/blob/master/README.md)
